messages.title: BUILDING A BRIGHTER FUTURE FOR MOLE VALLEY CONSTITUENCY
messages.content: Paul Kennedy discussing Lib Dem plans to improve our children's services with local councillor Bridget Kendrick

messages.title: The Liberal Democrats are WINNING
messages.content:
Right across the UK, Jo Swinson's Liberal Democrats are winning and gaining momentum.
GAINED over 700 new councillors in May's local elections.
BEAT Labour and the Conservatives in May's European Elections.
Membership has SURGED to a record high of over 125,000 members.
Won parliamentary by-elections in Brecon and Shetland.
MPs from both Labour and the Conservatives have JOINED the Lib Dems as more and more people find their home here.

messages.title: Vote Liberal Democrat for a brighter future
messages.content:
The Liberal Democrats can beat the Conservatives and win in Mole Valley.
Labour and Green cannot win here but your vote for Paul Kennedy can stop the Conservatives.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Remaining a full EU member will protect jobs, workers' rights and the economy.
As your MP, Paul will challenge the Conservatives who are threatening our countryside.
More funds for our NHS and demand better funding for local schools.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The Liberal Democrats can beat the Conservatives and win in Mole Valley. Labour and Green cannot win here but your vote for Paul Kennedy can stop the Conservatives.

issues.economy: Remaining a full EU member will protect jobs, workers' rights and the economy.
issues.education: More funds for our NHS and demand better funding for local schools.
issues.environment: Preserve our Green Belt. Paul will challenge the Conservatives who are threatening our countryside.

leaflet.personalStatement: As a local councillor Paul has already represented Mole Valley residents for many years and achieved great things, including rebuilding services after the government cuts and speaking up for local schools and the health service, and private sector. Paul will be a great MP with fresh ideas for the whole constituency, including better transport into London, reducing crime, and building affordable homes for local people to buy or rent.

politicalExperience.achievements: Represented Mole Valley residents for many years and achieved great things, including rebuilding services after the government cuts and speaking up for local schools and the health service.

quotes.text: "The Lib Dem fightback is real - and it's changing everything."

images.caption: The Liberal Democrats in a group photo
